channel.title: Internship-Work on Gati Aher's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Internship-Work on Gati Aher's Blog

item.title: Experiments in Handwriting Detection With Faster R-CNN
item.description: 1 INTRODUCTION 1.1 Datasets 1.2 Tough-to-Beat Baseline Model 2 BACKGROUND INFORMATION 2.1 Overview of Detectron-v2’s Faster R-CNN with FPN - DataMapper - Backbone Network - Details on Feature Pyramid Network - Region Proposal Network (RPN) - RPN Head - Map Ground Truths to Feature Maps With Cell Anchors (during training) - Loss Function (during training) - Box Proposal Selection - ROI Head - Re-Sampling and Matching (during training) - Cropping - Box Head - Loss Calculation - Inference 2.
